post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body:
Not gimp, but Pixel http://everlong-design.com/design/pixel-a-photoshop-alternative/

Multi-platform advanced photo editing comparable to photoshop, can't wait to see how my ps3 works with this under ubuntu

although it's not freeware, it's only $38 currently and is very much more affordable than photoshop.

post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: Cool thanks I'll have to check it out, I've been pretty happy with Gimp and PSP up to now, but I'm always looking out for something that may be better.
